original_text: Ye shall not respect persons in judgment; but ye shall hear the small as well as the great; ye shall not be afraid of the face of man; for the judgment is God's: and the cause that is too hard for you, bring it unto me, and I will hear it.
korean_text: 재판은 하나님께 속한 것인즉 너희는 재판할 때에 외모를 보지 말고 귀천을 차별 없이 듣고 사람의 낯을 두려워하지 말 것이며 스스로 결단하기 어려운 일이 있거든 내게로 돌리라 내가 들으리라 하였고

sentences.original_text: Ye shall not respect persons in judgment
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 재판에서 사람을 외모로 존중하지 말라

sentences.original_text: but ye shall hear the small as well as the great
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 자와 큰 자를 다르게 듣지 말고

sentences.original_text: ye shall not be afraid of the face of man
and the cause that is too hard for you
